Posts.Content: Jan 14, 2010 05:23AM jap wrote: Hi Carol, I went through TCH.  It can be hard but there are things you can do to make it more managable -- most of which I found on the TCH thread.   You should find it immediately because I think it will be very helpful.   I learned that saline infusion the next day will help so I demanded it from my oncologist -- and it did help.  I also had the drug to increase white blood cells cut (by 1/2)-- that also helped and my white blood count stayed high enough.  Take Zantac before the infusion and continue taking it. Lots of fluids by mouth two days before before and right after the infusion, etc.  All of these helpful recommendations and more you can find on the TCH chemo list. When you follow some of these suggestions you will feel better.  The TCH list will also give you moral support. Jo Anne
Posts.Title: Feel like hell my3sonz getwell
